A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Tedious battle/fight scenes spattered with unnecessary melodrama and uninspiring action that lacked the illusion of risk or vulnerability. If you ever wondered what Star Wars would be like if directed by James Cameron\, I think this gives a rather good impression. \n\nI grew up on the original Star Wars and enjoyed the last two (Episode 7 and Rogue One)\, but this was a disappointment. Without spoiling the film\, I was particularly irked by the final scene just before closing credits - you know the one I mean!
